acf.title: Treasurer
acf.bio_copy:
Vijay Pant is the firm’s Treasurer and responsible for overseeing equity financing, liquidity management, cash/collateral management and counterparty risk.

Prior to joining Millennium in 2014, Vijay was with Barclays Capital and Lehman Brothers for eight years, most recently as the Global Head of Listed Derivatives. He started with Lehman Brothers in 2006, holding senior roles in the Risk and Analytics Group within Prime Services. Prior to joining Lehman, he worked for Morgan Stanley in the Credit Risk Methodology Group.

Vijay received his PhD in Mathematics from the University of Michigan. He was an Associate Professor of Mathematics at Michigan.
